Oxygen permeability was measured by the indirect method (Ou, Wang, Tang, Huang, & Jackson, 2005). Fresh and antioxidant‐free sunflower oil was used as a control, and its peroxide value was measured. Wineglasses were filled with sunflower oil, covered with developed film, and stored at 25 ± 2°C and 75% relative humidity for 15 days.
